Producer: Sean Daniel, Nora Ephron, Jonathan D. Krane, Andrew Lazar
Production Co: Studio Canal, Paramount Pictures, DreamWorks SKG, Mad Chance
Sound Mix: Dolby Stereo, Dolby Digital, DTS, Surround, Dolby SR
Synopsis: Russ Richards (John Travolta) is a TV weatherman and local celebrity on the verge of losing his shirt. Desperate to escape financial ruin, he schemes with Crystal (Lisa Kudrow) the TV station's lotto ball girl to rig the state lottery drawing. The numbers come up right, but everything else goes wrong as the plan starts to unravel and the game turns rough.
Title: Lucky Numbers
